ValidationRule.description: Required Fields for GC Site Survey Required
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $User.Bypass_Automation__c = false, $Profile.Id = '2F00ef4000000GmzO', ISPICKVAL( GC_Site_Survey_Required__c , 'Yes'), ISBLANK( GC_Site_Survey_Complete_Date__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: GC Site Survey Required is Yes; Please enter the GC Site Survey Complete Date
